summary: Frontend-only testing of bug fixes for Laws & Government Schemes system. All 3 bug fixes verified working: 1) Laws screen Central/State tabs are click-only (not swipeable), category filters support horizontal swipe, 2) Cases screen has single summary card with All/Ongoing/Upcoming/Closed tabs and swipe indicator dots, no duplicate filter row, 3) Law Detail page back navigation returns to Laws list (not Home) and scroll-to-top implemented on id change.
critical_code_review_comments: Laws screen (laws.tsx): Central/State tabs use TouchableOpacity with onPress - NOT swipeable. PanResponder only attached to swipeContainer for category filter changes. 'Swipe for categories' hint visible.

Cases screen (cases.tsx): tabs array includes 'all' as first element. Single 'My Cases' summary card with All/Ongoing/Upcoming/Closed tabs. Swipe indicator dots rendered inside content area. No duplicate tabBar.

Law Detail (law-detail/[id].tsx): handleBack() uses router.canGoBack() check - if true calls router.back(), else router.replace('/(tabs)/laws'). scrollViewRef.current?.scrollTo({ y: 0, animated: false }) called in useEffect on id change.
PanResponder implementation uses useRef to track activeTab/selectedCategory to avoid stale closure issues - good pattern.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 bug fixes verified working via Playwright UI testing. App is React Native/Expo running on web (port 3000). Mock data used for laws and cases. Disclaimer modal appears on first load - press Escape or click outside to close.

laws_screen.central_state_tabs_clickable: PASS - Tabs are TouchableOpacity with onPress, not swipeable
laws_screen.category_chips_clickable: PASS - Category filter chips work correctly

cases_screen.no_duplicate_filter_row: PASS - Single 'My Cases' summary card only
cases_screen.swipe_indicator_dots: PASS - 4 dots visible below summary card
cases_screen.swipe_hint_visible: PASS - 'Swipe' text visible in summary card header

law_detail_page.back_navigation: PASS - Returns to Laws list, not Home
law_detail_page.scroll_to_top_on_id_change: PASS - Code implements scrollTo({y:0}) in useEffect on id change
law_detail_page.related_for_you_section: PASS - Section visible with related law cards
